metadata.Title: CVE-2023-47470 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in Ffmpeg before github commit4565747056a11356210ed8edcecb920105e40b60 allows a remote attacker toachieve an out-of-array write, execute arbitrary code, and cause a denialof service (DoS) via the ref_pic_list_struct function inlibavcodec/evc_ps.c

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
